quote_last: when Gerald drove up onto the grass and pulled the limousine right next to the cemetery.
title: Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote_first: Teacher used to lie awake at night facing that clock, batting his eyelashes against his pillowcase to mimic the sound of the rolling drop action. One night, and this first night is lost in the countless later nights of compounding wonder, he discovered a game. Say the time was
title: Lessons in Essence
author: Dana Standridge
